bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Testability Method for Embedded Core-based Integrated Circuits
IEEE Standard Testability Method for Embedded Core-based Integrated Circuits

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines a mechanism for the test of core designs within a system on chip (SoC). This mechanism constitutes a hardware architecture and leverages the core test language (CTL) to facilitate communication between core designers and core integrators.

This standard defines a mechanism for the test of core designs within a system on chip (SoC). This mechanism constitutes a hardware architecture and leverages the core test language (CTL) to facilitate communication between core designers and core integrators.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
